pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fast Step Graph: A Fast Sparse Precision Matrix Estimation Algorithm // It implements an improved and computationally faster version of the original Stepwise Gaussian Graphical Algorithm for estimating the Omega precision matrix from high- dimensional data. Zamar, R., Ruiz, M., Lafit, G. and Nogales, J. (2021) doi:10.52933/jdssv.v1i2.11.
